CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 2, 1955, pg. 1, reads: "Convicted Slayer Baptized - Elijah Thompson, convicted and sentenced to die for the brutal murder of a young girl, leaves his jail cell long enough to be baptized in Baptist Church. Performing the ceremony is the Rev. Grant Roberts at Triedstone Baptist Church, Aliquippa. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Convicted murderer Elijah Thompson wearing light colored robe, facing man wearing dark pinstriped suit and eyeglasses, reading from book, in Triedstone Baptist Church for baptism, Aliquippa
